item: Coal: Black Coal, Anthracite, Bituminous, Subbituminous, Lignite
snippet:
Yancoal is a leading Australian coal
producer and exporter to the global
seaborne market, producing a mix of
premium thermal, semi-soft coking
and PCI coals.
flag_reasoning: Report covers all owned, operated, and managed mines.
Name: YANCOAL AUSTRALIA LTD

item: Fuels: Diesel, Gasoline, LPG (Liquid Petroleum Gas), ULP (Unleaded Petrol), Automotive fuel, Kerosene, Aviation fuel, Jet fuel, Premium
snippet:
Yancoal’s energy consumption is driven
predominately by diesel fuel consumption
across our operations, followed by
electricity consumption.
flag_reasoning: Report covers all owned, operated, and managed mines.
Name: YANCOAL AUSTRALIA LTD
